attributes.action: Recommend that Plymouth Civic Centre is NOT granted Listed Building status
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A small group has petitioned English Heritage to grant the Plymouth Civic Centre building Grade II listed building status, against the wishes of the great majority of local people and those who work there.
The building is not attractive, is falling apart, and would cost £40 million to make fit for its purpose of housing Council offices.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
